summary: A pollster stumbles on a family of murderous hillbillies, and joins in their search for hidden treasure.
cast: Fred MacMurray|Helen Walker|Marjorie Main|Jean Heather|Porter Hall|Peter Whitney|Mabel Paige|Barbara Pepper|Harry Allen|Walter Baldwin|Jimmie Dundee|Tom Fadden|James Flavin|Francis Ford|Joel Friedkin|Arthur Hunnicutt|Jerry James|Si Jenks|George McKay|William Meader|Milton Parsons|Ralph Peters|Syd Saylor
keywords: female gangster|woman smokes a cigar|cigar smoking|slapstick comedy|screwball comedy
title: Murder, He Says
